Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.Recorder

Class Recorder

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.Recorder.Recorder
public class Recorder extends Object
Recorder class contains necessary methods for App to use to save and load replay files
Author:
Bernard Del Puerto

    • extractGameObj

      public static ArrayList<org.json.JSONObject> extractGameObj(File file)
      Extracts all the contents of the given JSON file and stores them in an ArrayList of JSONObjects that is returned.
      Parameters:
      file - File that objects are being extracted from
      Returns:
      ArrayList of JSONObjects from JSON file

    • resetTempJSON

      public static void resetTempJSON()
      Resets JSON file for temporarily saving game data. Called when player wins or loses.

    • sendGame

      public static Domain sendGame(ArrayList<org.json.JSONObject> list, int index)
      Responsible for retrieving a Domain object from an ArrayList of JSON objects.
      Parameters:
      list - List of JSON objects from replay file
      index - Requested index of retrieval object
      Returns:
      Domain object at specified index
